title: Is it good to do a B.Ed. after a B.Com.? - Quora

response.answer_text: Why Not !! Yes you can do B.Ed course after Completing your Bcom. The Basic Educational Qualification to Apply for B.Ed Course is, the Aspirant should have Completed Bachelor degree in any discipline from recognized University .The Eligibility Criteria for B.Ed Course differs From institution to Institution . To apply for this B.Ed Course you should Complete Under graduation Courses like, BA BCom,Bsc,BBA from recognized University . Minimum 55% Percentage marks are required in UG program .There is no Age Limit for B.Ed Course. You need to Crack the B.Ed Entrance Examination . Cut off varies from university to university. A few good universities are: Indira Gandhi National Open University (IGNOU), New Delhi Jamia Millia Islamia Centre for Distance and Open Learning (JMI-CDOL), DelhiBangalore University Directorate of Correspondence Courses and Distance Education Lovely Professional University , Punjab Bharathiar University - School of Distance Education Andhra University School of Distance Education (AUSDE), Visakhapatnam, Andhra Pradesh Annamalai University Directorate of Distance Education (DDE) Bharathidasan University - Center for Distance Education Himachal Pradesh University International Centre for Distance Education and Open Learning , Shimla, Himachal Pradesh Kakatiya University School of Distance Learning & Continuing Education, Warangal, Andhra Pradesh Utkal university,Odisha
